description: CDX files are created by CorelDRAW, a vector graphics editing program. These files are a compressed version of the .CDR drawing files, which are the main file format used by CorelDRAW. The purpose of creating CDX files is to reduce the amount of storage space required for a drawing.

instructions:
CDX files can be opened by the following programs

CorelDRAW Graphics Suite 2023 (Free Trial) for Windows
